commands.dmDisabled: This command cannot be run in a DM
commands.dmUnsupported: DMs currently are not supported for this bot
commands.blacklistedUser: You have been blocked from this command

perms.notDynamic: This command does not use dynamic permissions.
perms.unknownFilter:
Unknown filter. Allowed types are `channel`, `user` and `role`
 `channel` is only allowed in blacklist, `role` is only allowed in whitelist.

targets.unsupportedTarget: Whatever you targetted is voodoo, and this bot ignores it.
